Topic.Title: Sorry for such a newbie problem! Any help is very appreciated!

Posts.EditableText: I am new to using Quest and have installed it for Windows. But I can't seem to start a new project. Following the tutorial, I got as far as installing it and getting to the Create New Game screen. I have selected a folder and game name, I have chosen Text Adventure and I have chosen English. Yet the OK button will not illuminate. Only the Cancel. It doesn't seem to matter which folder I choose or which game name I type, I cannot move forward, the OK button stays dim and unselectable. Please tell me what I'm doing wrong? Thanks a million!!
Posts.HTML: I am new to using Quest and have installed it for Windows. But I can't seem to start a new project. Following the tutorial, I got as far as installing it and getting to the Create New Game screen. I have selected a folder and game name, I have chosen Text Adventure and I have chosen English. Yet the OK button will not illuminate. Only the Cancel. It doesn't seem to matter which folder I choose or which game name I type, I cannot move forward, the OK button stays dim and unselectable. Please tell me what I'm doing wrong? Thanks a million!!

Posts.EditableText:
What file path are you trying to save it to?

Also, I've noticed that Quest gets confused if you try to set a save directory before naming your project.
Posts.HTML:
What file path are you trying to save it to?

Also, I've noticed that Quest gets confused if you try to set a save directory before naming your project.
